blog.name: i-see-you-now-you-see-me
blog.title: ○◆Tell me what to do◇ ●
blog.description: I used to write for The Flash, but now i do a bit of BTS... first fiction is up and running - Two Worlds! Requests are opened, gotta do this, message me any time... still reading too much fanfiction ... so im here to write my own.

tags: maybe all bts at some point
summary: So I started to dabble a bit in a different fan fiction sector, anyway, it will be a bit different, since it’s another fandom....
caption:
So I started to dabble a bit in a different fan fiction sector, anyway, it will be a bit different, since it’s another fandom. The beginning is quite long, since I needed the back story to make sense, and here it goes.

Pairing: BTS Jimin x Reader (and a distant relative of Reader in the first chapter)

Warnings: Yandere themes, violence, sex (future), mentions of killing and a lot of other stuff I will try to warn about on next chapters.

Summary: A BTS fan-sign gone wrong when the king of Dark Fae lands comes back to life to take his claim (the Reader), first chapter includes a distant relative from year 1770 who meets a stranger in the woods and sells his daughter for a better future, times were tough ok! Everything comes with a price, so …

Word count: holl, not that much, only the beginning of story so :D something like 780 words, easy!

*London country side, England, year 1778*

-Mother, why do we have to leave, I do not want it!

-Since your father got a new place for his knowledge in science, it is better to move, we will be closer to the town, and maybe you will finally do something else besides wandering around near the woods.

She loved the woods and the country side, if it wasn’t for a walk gone wrong, she would never had met nymph boy who lived there.

She was only five years old when it happened, and now when she was eight, she still met him every month or so.

-I must leave, you won’t see me anymore, - she said and took his hand in hers.

The nymph took of a necklace he wore all the time and gave it to the girl, little did she know that he was not a nymph, or that this was the first step of many that would change her future in many ways.

-Jimin, I will always remember you, - she said when both said their goodbyes.

Her father had met a stranger from the woods a little after his daughter was born. And he had offered him a future, if only he would marry his daughter off to his son. Father not really considering everything said yes and made a deal with the king of the Fae lands.

It wasn’t often when the Fae’s and humans mixed up, they had just found out that human females carry and bare children better than their Fae’s, and the king, thinking about his son’s future decided it would be better this way.

He had seen the beauty the girl will carry, and he had seen a happy ever after.

*10 years later*

-Jimin? – she saw him again. – what a surprise!? What are you doing here?

-Hello, - he seemed a bit distant, hesitating a bit.

It had been ten years since they last saw each other, but she would know him anywhere. Jimin had come to collect what belongs to him.

-We need to talk, - he stated.

She trusted him. Jimin helped her find her way home when she got lost, he was there for her when she needed him. He was always watching.

It was evening, when everyone sat down together in the living room and Jimin stood up speaking.

-I am here to collect what rightfully belongs to me. I have come of age, and I am ready to rule my kingdom.

Father stood up putting his fists in the air. Out of nowhere the king of Fae lands showed up.

-We had a deal, - the king spoke and walked towards the girl, who looked as surprised as her mother. - your daughter is ours.

-What are they talking about? – she asked.

-Three years from now, my son will come back and take his claim once and for all, you can have your goodbyes, it should be enough time to prepare your daughter, I guess… we’ll be going.

They both disappeared.

Everything changed.

Her mother looked for magicians and witches who could save her daughter from this and came across the Four Goddess of Fae lands. She sold her soul to save her daughter.

But they had their own reason for helping. In the future Park Jimin becomes ruthless ruler of his lands, destroying those who wishes to take his place, evil running in his dark blood, dark magic flowing through his veins.

-Give this to your daughter on the day, when the prince comes to get her, and you will be saved.

Strange enough the taking took place in abandoned cave near waters, the girl drank the potion and waited. A portal opened and both the king and prince stepped out.

The Goddess of Water and Air were watching from the other side, making sure everything is going as they had planned it will.

Jimin took her hand in his and was ready to disappear but was frozen to the spot. The king got thrusted back in the portal with the help of Air Goddess, and as soon as that happened, the Goddess of Fire and Nature showed up, they all started chanting.

Jimin stood there still not able to move and inch, and the girl and her mother ran away. The magic pushed Jimin deeper in the cave, far away from the land and people, deep under water, where he would lay frozen, except…

…he was chanting magic in his head, he was sure that this is not going to end like this. He will have his revenge, doesn’t matter when, but he will have his claim sooner or later, and he’ll punish those responsible.

TBC

Anyway let me know if you like it, a feedback would be appreciated, will post the next part soon, thank you!

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonseok
blog.title: Hwagae Market
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok|J-Hope/Min Yoongi|Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Travelers Guide To Kim Taehyung
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FplaEg

by jeonjeonggay

there’s many things taehyung’s loves, jeongguk just so happens to be one of them

blog.name: gaja-aegiya-gaja
blog.title: I can't see when I'm laughing either

summary: Im already seeing people say that they will Stan txt more than BTS. Someone said that txt is closer to their age and that BTS...
question: Im already seeing people say that they will Stan txt more than BTS. Someone said that txt is closer to their age and that BTS will enlist anyway. Those right there are FAKE army sorry. For me.. I became a fan of their music and then fell in love with their personalities. BTS are just soo different than any other group I’ve seen. To be honest.. BTS worked so hard and had to deal with shit when trying to break into the industry. Txt kind of have a head start don’t u think?
answer: Hi! They definitely do have a head start, but it’s not their fault or something they need to fix since ARMYs are the ones giving them so much attention in the first place. TXT is just another boy group for me rn. Until I listen to some actual music from them or watch their MVs, I don’t have any opinions on them and I don’t think I need to because I’m a BTS fan, not a Big Hit Entertainment fan. And as for the ARMYs who are saying that they will shift their sights to TXT just because they’re younger than BTS and because BTS will be enlisting… that’s their own loss. :) If age is the most important thing factor that decides the artists that you like because you feel like you can relate to artists closer to your age, that’s your taste and I respect that, but I do think it’s kinda shallow. Thanks for the question 😊

Thanks for the question 😊
